topic: Text-to-Image Model Evaluation and Bias Analysis

  entities:
    Kaiyi Huang|Researcher
    Yushi Hu|Researcher
    Jaemin Cho|Researcher
    Michal Yarom|Researcher
    Dhruba Ghosh|Researcher
    Eslam Mohamed Bakr|Researcher
    Tony Lee|Researcher
    Baiqi Li|Researcher
    Zhiqiu Lin|Researcher
    Patrick Schramowski|Researcher
    Yiting Qu|Researcher
    Sasha Luccioni|Researcher
    Hanjun Luo|Researcher
    Federico Bianchi|Researcher
    Felix Friedrich|Researcher
    T2i-compbench|Benchmark
    TIFA|Method
    GenEval|Framework
    HRS-bench|Benchmark
    DALL-Eval|Benchmark
    BIGbench|Benchmark
    Stable Diffusion|Model

  proposition: Kaiyi Huang et al. published a comprehensive benchmark for open-world compositional text-to-image generation called T2i-compbench.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Kaiyi Huang|PUBLISHED|T2i-compbench
    T2i-compbench|TYPE|Benchmark
    T2i-compbench|FOCUS|Open-world compositional text-to-image generation

    entity-entity relationships:
    Kaiyi Huang|AUTHOR_OF|T2i-compbench

  proposition: Yushi Hu et al. developed TIFA, an accurate and interpretable text-to-image faithfulness evaluation method using question answering.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    TIFA|TYPE|Method
    TIFA|CHARACTERISTIC|Accurate
    TIFA|CHARACTERISTIC|Interpretable
    TIFA|FOCUS|Text-to-image faithfulness evaluation

    entity-entity relationships:
    Yushi Hu|AUTHOR_OF|TIFA

  proposition: Jaemin Cho et al. proposed a Davidsonian scene graph to improve reliability in fine-grained evaluation for text-image generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Davidsonian scene graph|TYPE|Approach
    Davidsonian scene graph|FOCUS|Improving reliability in text-image generation evaluation

    entity-entity relationships:
    Jaemin Cho|PROPOSED|Davidsonian scene graph

  proposition: Eslam Mohamed Bakr et al. developed HRS-bench, a holistic, reliable, and scalable benchmark for text-to-image models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    HRS-bench|TYPE|Benchmark
    HRS-bench|CHARACTERISTIC|Holistic
    HRS-bench|CHARACTERISTIC|Reliable
    HRS-bench|CHARACTERISTIC|Scalable
    HRS-bench|FOCUS|Text-to-image models evaluation

    entity-entity relationships:
    Eslam Mohamed Bakr|AUTHOR_OF|HRS-bench

  proposition: Sasha Luccioni et al. evaluated societal representations in diffusion models through stable bias analysis.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Stable Diffusion|TYPE|Model
    Stable Diffusion|FOCUS|Societal representations
    Stable Diffusion|EVALUATED_BY|Bias analysis

    entity-entity relationships:
    Sasha Luccioni|CONDUCTED|Bias analysis

  proposition: Jaemin Cho et al. probed the reasoning skills and social biases of text-to-image generation models using DALL-Eval.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    DALL-Eval|TYPE|Benchmark
    DALL-Eval|FOCUS|Probing reasoning skills and social biases

    entity-entity relationships:
    Jaemin Cho|USED|DALL-Eval

  proposition: Hanjun Luo et al. created BIGbench, a unified benchmark for social bias in text-to-image generative models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    BIGbench|TYPE|Benchmark
    BIGbench|CHARACTERISTIC|Unified
    BIGbench|FOCUS|Social bias in text-to-image generative models

    entity-entity relationships:
    Hanjun Luo|AUTHOR_OF|BIGbench

  proposition: Federico Bianchi et al. found that text-to-image generation amplifies demographic stereotypes at large scale.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Text-to-image generation|CHARACTERISTIC|Amplifies demographic stereotypes

    entity-entity relationships:
    Federico Bianchi|DISCOVERED|Demographic stereotypes amplification
